content.text: Just hanging out, enjoying the nice weather. I have a lot of laundry to do but I'm procrastinating haha
I know the feeling. I'm in the same boat. I also need to get some work done. I'm a crafter and I have a few projects that I need to finish.
That's awesome! What kinds of things do you craft?
I do a lot of different things. I love to make jewelry, I've also been working on some crochet projects lately, and I'm trying to learn how to knit.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to learn how to knit. I think it's so neat that you can make your own clothes and accessories.
It is really fun! It's a little tricky to get the hang of it at first, but once you do it's really rewarding.
Yeah I can imagine. I'm not very good with my hands, but I'm sure if I tried I could learn.
I'm sure you could! I've seen some really great stuff that people have made who are just starting out.
Well maybe I'll give it a try someday. For now, I'm just going to admire all of your beautiful crafts :)
Thanks! I'm always happy to share my work.
Well, I'm sure you're really busy, so I'll let you get back to your work. It was nice talking to you!
You too! Have a great day
